name: Biolaxi Corporation
overview:
Established in year 2007, we, “Biolaxi Corporation”, are a trustworthy organization engaged in developing, manufacturing and supplying a comprehensive range of Enzyme Formulations and Enzymes. Under this effective range, we cater the industries like Sugar, Bioethanol, Fruit Juice, Baking, Flour Mills, Textiles and Pharmaceuticals.

Aim / Vision / Mission: Our mission is to come up with innovative, customized, ecosafe enzyme formulations to improve the quality of your products. We are a team of engineers and technocrats with a wide range of experience in the enzyme industry. Using state of the art facilities we aim to provide timely delivery of high quality products and superior onsite support.

Objectives: Market and technology scouting Idea management Innovations management Product development Business development

Our Team: Chemical engineers Biotechnologist Food technologist Technicians Researchers Quality analysts

R & D Development: Our R&D team is focused on developing new enzyme complexes as desired by the customer and industry demands. Our in-house scientists focus on the needs of customers and also keep up to date with the latest developments in bioresearch.

Manufacturing Facilities: To meet the exact requirements of our customers’, we have constructed a sophisticated infrastructure unit at our premises, which enable us to formulate the Enzymes with strict manufacturing guidelines enable us to offer an consistent and superior quality products.
